export const metadata = { title: 'DateInput | Delta Components', description: 'A flexible and customizable date input component with calendar picker, validation support, and multiple style variants.', // Keywords help with SEO keywords: ['shadcn/ui', 'react', 'date input', 'calendar picker', 'form components', 'ui components', 'react components', 'delta components', 'nextjs components', 'tailwind components'], // Canonical URL to prevent duplicate content issues alternates: { canonical: 'https://deltacomponents.dev/docs/date-input', }, // Category helps with structured data category: 'component', openGraph: { title: 'DateInput Component | Delta Components', description: 'A flexible and customizable date input component with calendar picker, validation support, and multiple style variants.', type: 'article', url: 'https://deltacomponents.dev/docs/date-input', images: [ { url: 'https://deltacomponents.dev/og/date-input.png', width: 1200, height: 630, alt: 'DateInput Component Preview showing calendar date picker with various styling options' } ], // Article specific OpenGraph metadata article: { authors: ['Patrick Prunty'], tags: ['UI Components', 'React', 'Shadcn', 'Date Input', 'Form', 'Design'], section: 'Components' }, siteName: 'Delta Components' }, twitter: { card: 'summary_large_image', title: 'DateInput Component | Delta Components', description: 'A flexible and customizable date input component with calendar picker, validation support, and multiple style variants.', images: ['https://deltacomponents.dev/og/date-input.png'], creator: '@pprunty_', site: '@deltacomponents' }, // Additional metadata for better SEO robots: { index: true, follow: true, nocache: false, googleBot: { index: true, follow: true, 'max-image-preview': 'large', 'max-snippet': -1, 'max-video-preview': -1 } } } # DateInput A flexible date input component with an integrated calendar picker, validation support, and customizable styling options. ## Basic Usage ## Installation ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "date-input" ``` ## Props
Prop Type Default Description
`label` `string` - The label for the date field
`name` `string` - The name of the date field (used for form submission)
`description` `string` - Optional description text to display below the label
`hint` `string` - Optional hint text to display below the date picker
`error` `string` - Error message to display (typically from Zod validation)
`required` `boolean` `false` Whether the field is required
`placeholder` `string` `'Select a date'` Placeholder text when no date is selected
`variant` `'default' | 'pill'` `'default'` Date picker variant - 'default' or 'pill'
`coloredBorder` `boolean` `false` Whether to show a colored border (only applies to pill variant)
`disabled` `boolean` `false` Whether the date picker is disabled
`minDate` `Date` - Min date that can be selected
`maxDate` `Date` - Max date that can be selected
## Examples ### Default Variant ```tsx ``` ### Pill Variant with Colored Border ```tsx ``` ### With Min and Max Date Constraints ```tsx ``` ## Validation The DateInput component supports Zod validation: ```tsx import { z } from "zod"; import { useState } from "react"; import { DateInput } from "@/components/ui/date-input"; export default function DateValidationExample() { const [error, setError] = useState(); // Schema to validate the date is in the future const schema = z.date().min(new Date(), { message: "Date must be in the future", }); const handleValidate = (isValid: boolean, value: Date, error?: string) => { setError(error); }; return ( ); } ``` ## Accessibility The DateInput component is built with accessibility in mind: - Proper labeling and ARIA attributes - Keyboard navigation support in the calendar - Error messages are properly associated with inputs - Clear focus states for keyboard users
